attributes.review: upon downloading this app I was stuck at a loading screen for twenty minutes. 👎🏻👎🏻 once it did work the app constantly froze and showed content that is disturbing. I hope this app is taken down soon because the content is malicious and dangerous.
attributes.title: disappointing

attributes.review: This app is full of LIES and FAKE NEWS! It’s an absolute HAUX! I am a loyal Tr*mp supporter, one of the most loyal I might add, and I know the writings on this application to be FALSE! The president DIED and all of the media of him posted on this app and other news sights are PRE-RECORDED VIDEOS!! Don’t let the mainstream media tell you otherwise, they’re trying to manipulate us into wearing masks!!!!! #birdsarentreal
attributes.title: FAKE NEWS!!😤

attributes.review: donald trump. big stinky man. big fat man. orange. mean. doesn’t know how to run a country. can’t get any 🐱 so he has to assault women. we do NOT STAN DONALD TRUMP. bernie 2020. nicki minaj for vp. end systemic racism. defund the police. black lives matter. we will never stop fighting for the lives lost. breonna taylor. george floyd. ahmaud arbery. elijah mcclain. too many others. it’s us against trump. join the fight.
attributes.title: i hate trump!

attributes.review: It took 100 days to download and then when I finally got it it said all these racist, homophobic, sexist, xenophobic, etc. things. Trump is terrible and should not have an app. The information about the app was nothing like what was actually on the app. It spreads misinformation. The app glitches 90% of the time. And Trump is an orange.
attributes.title: Terrible DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: i got this app in hopes of it teaching me a bit more about trumps campaign and allowing me to see what he is all about for this upcoming election, but all i was met with was spam, clutter, and shallow advertisements. it took forever to download and when it finally did it caused my phone to crash and slow down, and i had continuously shut my phone on and off every time i opened the app. honestly, this app gave me know information and shows trump and his administration in a very bad light, my vote is not looking to go for him.
attributes.title: cluttered and uneducational

attributes.review: I downloaded it and mmm not for me. It kept crashing, it would log me out, I got kicked off the app right as I got on, and overall it’s just a horrible app. The orange dude on the app is weird too. Like why he so mad, I think he might have something wrong with him. Maybe it’s not the app who needs fixing....
attributes.title: Mmm no

attributes.review: White supremacy or white supremacism is the racist belief that white people are superior to people of other races and therefore should be dominant over them. White supremacy has roots in the now-discredited doctrine of scientific racism and often relies on pseudoscientific arguments. Like most similar movements such as neo-Nazism, white supremacists typically oppose members of other races as well as Jews.
attributes.title: Donald Trump is a White Supremacist

attributes.review: This app does not work. The minute I opened it, it started crashing. Once I FINALLY got it working, if the app was running in the background while I was on any other app, it would crash those as well. Extremely disappointed. Do not buy this app.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible

attributes.review: I tried using this app and it just continues to freeze even though I opened it multiple times. And when I tried to use it when it there were not useful resources so I would not recommend this app!!!!
attributes.title: Doesn’t even function correctly 😔

attributes.review: this app didn’t help me at all!!!!! for some reason they put a racist orange on my screen. i did not approve of that, but then again why would he ever need my consent. the app crashes and it’s overall very disappointing to even be on the app store in the US. :/ deserves a 0/5 stars but it won’t let me rate it that.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE
